interfaces

Interface WeatherSystem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WeatherModelImpl

    public interface WeatherSystem

    • Method Detail

      • refreshFavoriteWeatherData

        void refreshFavoriteWeatherData()
        A request to the system to download latest weather information for all favourited stations. NOTE: This should probably be thread safe if we decide to go for the thread safety challenge.

      • addFavoriteStation

        boolean addFavoriteStation(java.lang.String name)
        Adds a station to the favourites list by name.
        Parameters:
        name - of the station to add to favorites.
        Returns:
        True if the system managed to add the favourite, false otherwise.

      • removeFavoriteStation

        boolean removeFavoriteStation(java.lang.String name)
        Removes a station from the favourites list by name.
        Parameters:
        name - of the station to remove from favorites.
        Returns:
        True if the system managed to remove the favourite, false otherwise.

      • getFavoriteStations

        java.util.List<WeatherStation> getFavoriteStations()
        Gets favorite station.
        Returns:
        A list of favorite stations NOTE: This list is unmodifiable, attempts to modify the data will result in an exception being thrown.

      • getFavoriteStation

        WeatherStation getFavoriteStation(java.lang.String name)
        Gets favorite station.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the station.
        Returns:
        A favorite station or null if it doesn't exist

      • getWeatherStation

        WeatherStation getWeatherStation(java.lang.String name)
        Gets data for the first weather station with name found.
        Parameters:
        name - the string name for the station ie. "Laverton, Victoria"
        Returns:
        The weather station object requested if available, null otherwise.

      • getWeatherStations

        java.util.ArrayList<WeatherStation> getWeatherStations(State state,
                                                       java.lang.String subStr)
        Gets a weather station froma specific state and containing a substring in its name.
        Parameters:
        state - The state to search for the station
        subStr - The substring to match against the station name
        Returns:
        A List of stations matching the search

      • getWeatherStations

        java.util.ArrayList<WeatherStation> getWeatherStations(State state)
        Sources all stations available in a specified state.
        Parameters:
        state - An enum value representing the state you want stations for.
        Returns:
        An arrayList containing all stations belonging to the passed in state.

      • getWeatherStations

        java.util.ArrayList<WeatherStation> getWeatherStations(java.lang.String subStr)
        Searches for stations with a specified sub-string in their name.
        Parameters:
        subStr - The sub-string to match against stations.
        Returns:
        A list of all stations with the specified string contained within their name.

      • getWeatherStations

        java.util.ArrayList<WeatherStation> getWeatherStations()
        Get all weather stations currently stored internally by the weather system.
        Returns:
        A list containing all weather stations.

      • registerRefreshableCallback

        void registerRefreshableCallback(IWeatherSystemCallback cb)
        Registers a refreshable interface with the system. Each time a change is made the system will call refresh on the views.
        Parameters:
        cb - The interface to call refresh on.
